entry.title: 3M SM46180 - Scotch-Brite Radial Bristle Brush, 6 in x 7/16 in x 1 in 6 Micron With Adapter, Sm46180 7000046180
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 62.23

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Radial Bristle Brush, 6 in x 7/16 in x 1 in 6 Micron with Adapter, 5 per case

  • The Scotch-Brite™ Radial Bristle Brush features 3M Ceramic Abrasive Grain technology blended with aluminum oxide and moulded into flexible bristles
  • This brush allows for more surface contact than wire brushes and continually self-sharpens so the abrasive doesn't dull over time
  • Use this brush to help remove paint, stains, adhesives, weld burns, rust, heavy oxides, and surface contaminants.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Micron 6
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Molded, abrasive filled bristles finish, polish, and deburr, more effectively than wire brushes
  • Proprietary 3M Ceramic Abrasive Grain blend provides high degree of finish quality throughout the life of the disc
  • Cleans with minimal pressure
  • Flexible bristles produce uniform finishes around protrusions, detail grooves, patterns, and other hard-to-reach areas
  • Contains no wire filaments for improved safety
    		•

entry.title: 3M Scotch-Brite SB33215 - Scotch-Brite Radial Bristle Brush 6 Inch X 7/16 Inch X 1 Inch 80 With Adapter 5 Per Case 7000028536
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Wheels
Price: 64.10

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Radial Bristle Brush, 6 in x 7/16 in x 1 in 80 with Adapter, 5 per case

  • Scotch-Brite Radial Bristle Brush, using our proprietary ceramic abrasive grain blended with aluminum oxide and molded, flexible bristles, provides more surface contact than wire brushes and maintains abrasive property throughout the life of the brush
  • Our brush removes paint, stains, adhesives, weld burns, rust, heavy oxides, and surface contaminants.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch-Brite
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Wheels

    Product Information

  • Molded, abrasive filled bristles finish, polish, and deburr, more effectively than wire brushes
  • Proprietary 3M Ceramic Abrasive Grain blend provides high degree of finish quality throughout the life of the disc
  • Cleans with minimal pressure
  • Flexible bristles produce uniform finishes around protrusions, detail grooves, patterns, and other hard-to-reach areas
  • Contains no wire filaments for improved safety
